alert.note: Alert for Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 21 at 2:36PM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior with existing or new fires. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zone....280. In North Central WY Fire Zone....281. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Natrona. In North Central WY...Johnson. * WIND: West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM
